title: The Popes pittiful lamentation, for the death of his deere darling Don Ioan of Austria and deaths aunswer to the same. With an epitaphe vpon the death of the said Don Ioan. Translated after the French printed coppy. by H.C.
author: Chettle, Henry, d. 1607?, attributed name.
notes: The attribution to Pope Gregory XIII is ironic. "The 'French coppy' is untraced, and may be fictitious"--Halkett & Laing (3rd ed.).
Translation sometimes attributed to Henry Chettle and to Henry Constable.
The work is dated 1 October 1578, the date of John of Austria's death.
Colophon reads "Imprinted by I.C."; printer's name from STC.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
